items.text: Using the FusedLocationProviderClient before version 12.0.0 causes the client app to crash when Google Play services is updated on the device.
items.href: java - Android LocationServices.FusedLocationApi deprecated - Stack Overflow

items.text: So I think we should continue using the deprecated LocationServices.FusedLocationApi until Google resolves the issue.
items.href: java - Android LocationServices.FusedLocationApi deprecated - Stack Overflow

items.text: The warning is gone now.  Google Play services 11.6 November 6, 2017, release note says :  I think Play Services won't crash when it updates itself in the background.
